name: The Bot That Refused To Die
name_original: The Bot That Refused To Die
description:
The robot will refuse to die! Help it to reach the end of life and death!

Arrows up and down to move. Avoid the enemies!

level1: Earth
level2: Hell
levle3: Heaven!

Programmer: me!
